actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Charm Animals and Plants (Recharge After a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: Each animal and plant within 30 feet of the priest that can see and hear it must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is charged by the priest until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared.

Cantrips (at will): guidance, thorn whip, druidcraft.
1st level (4 slots): animal friendship, goodberry, speak with animals
2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, spike growth
3rd level (2 slots): plant growth, wind wall
